tool_wa_button_generator_sub_title: Use this free tool to create a custom WhatsApp floating button that you can place on your own website
tool_wa_button_generator_input_alias_hel: This alias will be the identifier to get the button through the shortcode

tool_wa_button_generator_input_visitor_m: This text will tell the visitors where they should write their message
tool_wa_button_generator_input_phone_num: This is your WhatsApp phone number where messages should arrive. It should always be in international format
tool_wa_button_generator_input_color_sch: `Automatic` will select the scheme based on the visitor's browser configuration
tool_wa_button_generator_input_position_: Where in the screen the widget will be displayed
tool_wa_button_generator_input_notificat: The badge will be displayed to influence the visitor to write you a message. Once the notification is displayed, it will remain hidden for 24 hours
